titleStmt.title: Duke Hamilton Earl of Cambridge his case, spoken to, and argued on the behalf of the Commonwealth, before the High Court of Justice. By Mr. Steel of Grays-Inn.
titleStmt.author: Steele, William, d. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Tyton, at the Three Daggers near the Inner Temple-Gate, Fleetstreet,
